body.p: To his Excellency Gov Magoffin The undersigned respectfully represent that at the present term of the Harrison Circuit Court a fine of $500. for setting up & playing a game of faro was imposed upon John Keller also a fine of $50 -- for carrying concealed weapons

Mr. Kellers occupation is that of a farmer & Distiller and the gaming for which he was fined was a mere frolic with some young friends and his indictment for it a matter of spite: the $50. fine for carrying concealed weapons grew out of the same spirit: Mr Keller had a difficulty with the party who procured the indictment to be found and in it the concealed weapon came to light
Mr Keller has been pursued by the vindictive spite in the whole affair we therefore pray that said fines may be remitted
